title: Advertisement
welcome:
Hello!

This is a quiz about advertising. It contains {length} questions. Click the button below!
author: Nircek, Monika 452

questions.question: How many advertisements do we see every day?
When did the first advertisement with the Milka purple cow come out?
How many children drew a purple cow in the competition?
What are subliminal messages?
answers: words spoken in a crowd or short texts in videos
little pieces of informations repeated many times
little thing that has a meaning eg. velvet

questions.question: Does an advertisement have an influence on our subconcious?
Which of the following is NOT an argument confirming that advertisements have a small influence on our subconscious?
answers: it affects us only for short period of time
it depends on a person's attributes

questions.question: How much did Coca-cola spend on advertising in 2016?
